meanings.definition: A person who uses drugs excessively.
meanings.sent1: The druggy was always looking for their next fix.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood was concerned about the druggy hanging around the park.
meanings.sent3: The druggy accidentally mistook sugar for drugs and tried to snort it.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a rollercoaster ride with the druggy constantly by her side.
meanings.sent5: The image of the druggy passed out on the sidewalk was a stark reminder of the dangers of addiction.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of drug users.
meanings.sent1: The druggy behavior of the individual raised red flags for the authorities.
meanings.sent2: The party scene was filled with druggy vibes and dim lights.
meanings.sent3: The druggy music blaring from the car made everyone laugh uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The city streets at night had a druggy atmosphere that made her uneasy.
meanings.sent5: The druggy smell of the room lingered long after the party was over.
